prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon with a fierce expression and a sturdy shell.
I want a blue and gold Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with claws.
Generate a Pokemon that has a majestic appearance, combining aquatic and terrestrial features.
Make a dual-type Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, perfect for battles.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in both caves and mountains, showcasing its ancient lineage.
Design a Pokemon with elaborate armor and a striking color palette that commands attention.
Give me a Pokemon that can adapt to different environments, showcasing its versatility and power.
